name: Nyarlathotep, the True False Legend
text:
Swiftness Limit 2 (This card enters your field with two limits counters on it. Whenever this card attacks or blocks ⇒ Remove a limit counter from it.)
When this card enters your field ⇒ It deals 800 damage to target resonator.
At the end of turn ⇒ Is there are no limit counters on this card, put it into your ruler area, as a ruler.
